verses.plain: O clap your hands, all ye people; shout unto God with the voice of triumph.

tokens.t: O clap your hands, all ye people; shout unto God with the voice of triumph.

verses.plain: For the LORD most high is terrible; he is a great King over all the earth.

tokens.t: a great King over all the earth.

verses.plain: He shall subdue the people under us, and the nations under our feet.

tokens.t: He shall subdue the people under us, and the nations under our feet.

verses.plain: He shall choose our inheritance for us, the excellency of Jacob whom he loved. Selah.

tokens.t: He shall choose our inheritance for us, the excellency of Jacob whom he loved. Selah.

verses.plain: God is gone up with a shout, the LORD with the sound of a trumpet.

tokens.t: God is gone up with a shout, the
with the sound of a trumpet.

verses.plain: Sing praises to God, sing praises: sing praises unto our King, sing praises.

tokens.t: Sing praises to God, sing praises: sing praises unto our King, sing praises.

verses.plain: For God is the King of all the earth: sing ye praises with understanding.

tokens.t: the King of all the earth: sing ye praises with understanding.

verses.plain: God reigneth over the heathen: God sitteth upon the throne of his holiness.

tokens.t: God reigneth over the heathen: God sitteth upon the throne of his holiness.

verses.plain: The princes of the people are gathered together, even the people of the God of Abraham: for the shields of the earth belong unto God: he is greatly exalted.

tokens.t: The princes of the people are gathered together,
the people of the God of Abraham: for the shields of the earth
unto God: he is greatly exalted.

princes…: or, voluntary of the people are gathered unto the people of the God of Abraham
